ng-add.description: Adds Essential JS 2 specific Angular package to an application

calendar-daterange.description: Create an Angular calendar component with date range feature

calendar-disableddates.description: Create an Angular calendar component with disabled dates

calendar-multiselection.description: Create an Angular calendar component with multi selection feature

calendar-views.description: Create an Angular calendar component with year and month views

calendar-weeknumber.description: Create an Angular calendar component with enable week number

datepicker-daterange.description: Create an Angular datepicker component with date range feature

datepicker-disableddates.description: Create an Angular datepicker component with disabled dates

datepicker-format.description: Create an Angular datepicker component with format feature

datepicker-multiselection.description: Create an Angular datepicker component with multi selection feature

datepicker-strictmode.description: Create an Angular datepicker component with strict mode feature

datepicker-views.description: Create an Angular datepicker component with month and year views

daterangepicker-daterange.description: Create an Angular daterangepicker component with date range feature

daterangepicker-dayspan.description: Create an Angular daterangepicker component with day span feature

daterangepicker-disableddates.description: Create an Angular daterangepicker component with disabled date values

daterangepicker-format.description: Create an Angular daterangepicker component with format feature

daterangepicker-presets.description: Create an Angular daterangepicker component with presets feature

daterangepicker-strictmode.description: Create an Angular daterangepicker component with strict mode feature

datetimepicker-daterange.description: Create an Angular datetimepicker component with date range feature

datetimepicker-disableddates.description: Create an Angular datetimepicker component with disabled dates

datetimepicker-format.description: Create an Angular datetimepicker component with format feature

datetimepicker-multiselection.description: Create an Angular datetimepicker component with multi selection feature

datetimepicker-strictmode.description: Create an Angular datetimepicker component with strict mode feature

datetimepicker-views.description: Create an Angular datetimepicker component with month and year views

timepicker-format.description: Create an Angular timepicker component with format feature

timepicker-scrollto.description: Create an Angular timepicker component with scrollto feature

timepicker-step.description: Create an Angular timepicker component with step values representation

timepicker-strictmode.description: Create an Angular timepicker component with strict mode feature

timepicker-timerange.description: Create an Angular timepicker component with time range feature
